name: BoxCam: Prototype
description:
An Active Ragdoll Based On Games Such As Gang Beasts And Human Fall Flat.

How To Play The Game?

In The Full Build Of The Game , It'll Include Cooperative Puzzels , Deathmatch Arenas , And Fun Little Open World Maps To Explore , As Well As That Most Of The Gameplay Will Be Worked On To Make Interactive Items
(Break Tables , Glass , Use Buttons , ect)

Controls Player1:
  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Return Key
  • Left Punch: Left Bracket Key ("[")
  • Raise Hands: P Key 
  • Grab Nearby Objects: O Key
  • Release Objects: I Key
Controls Player2:
  • Movement: W, A, S, D, Keys
  • Jump: Z Key
  • Left Punch: X Key
  • Raise Hands: B Key
  • Grab Nearby Objects: N Key
  • Release Objects: M Key
Future Updates Planned:
  • - Multiplayer (may take month or less , due to me being bad at unity)
  • - Xbox 360/ect Controllers Able To Use For Game (may take a week or a day?)
  • - Levels (may take weeks? planning at least 10 levels which are randomly selected)
  • - Menu (may take a day to complete)
  • - 1 Player (may take a day)
  • - Up To 4 Player Gaming (may take a day or more)
  • - Interactive Gameplay (things like buttons or breakable items, may take a day)
  • - Sound Effects (may considered to be added after main features are done , a week to do)

Download Has Been Published! Feel Free To Download The Game!
